content.question:
​<math alttext="ln open parentheses fraction numerator T subscript t minus T subscript s over denominator T subscript 0 minus T subscript s end fraction close parentheses equals negative k t"><semantics><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mi>t</mi></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mi>s</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mi>s</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
​The given equation represents the logarithmic form of Newton’s law of cooling, which states that the temperature <math alttext="T subscript t"><semantics><msub><mi>T</mi><mi>t</mi></msub><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> of an object at time <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> satisfies the given equation, where <math alttext="T subscript 0"><semantics><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is the temperature of the object at time <math alttext="t equals 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="T subscript s"><semantics><msub><mi>T</mi><mi>s</mi></msub><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is the object’s surrounding temperature, and <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a positive constant that depends on characteristics of the object. 
The temperature is measured in degrees Celsius (<math alttext="degree text C end text"><semantics><mrow><mo>°</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>), and time <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is in minutes. When a certain object is removed from an oven, it takes <math alttext="30"><semantics><mn>30</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> minutes for the object to cool from <math alttext="180 degree text C end text"><semantics><mrow><mn>180</mn><mo>°</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> to <math alttext="30 degree text C end text"><semantics><mrow><mn>30</mn><mo>°</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> when the surrounding temperature is <math alttext="20 degree text C end text"><semantics><mrow><mn>20</mn><mo>°</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. How many minutes would it take the same object to cool from <math alttext="180 degree text C end text"><semantics><mrow><mn>180</mn><mo>°</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> to <math alttext="30 degree text C end text"><semantics><mrow><mn>30</mn><mo>°</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> when the surrounding temperature is <math alttext="24 degree text C end text"><semantics><mrow><mn>24</mn><mo>°</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
